items.text: The repository includes a comprehensive TODO scanner that helps track technical debt and work items across the codebase.

items.contextBefore: The scanner looks for these markers (case-insensitive):

items.text: 1. **Weekly scans**: Run `make todo-scan` during sprint planning
items.contextAfter: 2. **Triage new items**: Review `todo-report.md` for high-priority issues

items.text: 2. **Triage new items**: Review `todo-report.md` for high-priority issues
items.contextBefore: 1. **Weekly scans**: Run `make todo-scan` during sprint planning
items.contextAfter: 3. **Convert to issues**: Move critical TODOs into GitHub issues or `spec/BACKLOG.md`

items.text: - Use `TODO` for planned features or improvements
items.contextAfter: - Use `FIXME` for known bugs or issues

items.text: - Use `FIXME` for known bugs or issues
items.contextBefore: - Use `TODO` for planned features or improvements
items.contextAfter: - Use `HACK` for temporary workarounds that need proper solutions

items.text: - Avoid `XXX` except for urgent attention-required items

.PHONY: dev-shell test-all ci-local dev-up dev-down check-imports conformance perf help lint test-race vet qa dist-clean binaries-local images-local sbom-local scan-local docs-archive release-local sdk-test sdk-merge-spec example-sdk todo-scan

docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm dev 'bash -lc "go run tools/todoscan/main.go . && echo \"\" && echo \"📊 Quick Summary:\" && test -f reports/todo-report.json && jq -r \".totalCount,(.summary.countsByTag | to_entries[] | \\\"  - \\(.key): \\(.value)\\\")\" reports/todo-report.json || echo \"Reports generated in ./reports/\""'; \
items.contextAfter: elif command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1 && test -f tools/todoscan/main.go; then \
